name: Verge of Defeat
description:
Controls:

WASD to move

Space to dash/dodge

Left click to shoot, hold for rapid fire. (drones are invincible)

Story:

You've finally done it. You made it inside the Egdeehtno computer's core with your faithful energy pistol. This wretched mainframe has been tormenting your people with it's drones for years, and they are on the edge of extinction. But now you are on the edge of victory. All that's left is to show this computer who's boss.

Credits:
Programming: Hawke Gaming

Graphics: Josle

Music: DaforLynx (if you like this music, make sure to check out his  Bandcamp)

SFX: NateTheSoundNinja
